name: Chuao Mintfully Brownie Chocolate Bar
description: Inspired by a letter from a 6th grade class, this blend of refreshing mint crystals, rich brownie and ultra-smooth dark chocolate, shows that delicious has nothing to do with age.Ingredients: 60% dark chocolate (cacao, cane sugar, cacao butter, sunflower lecithin [as an emulsifier], natural vanilla), brownie (wheat flour, sugar, palm oil, cocoa, salt, natural flavor, baking soda), mint sprinkle (cane sugar, natural flavor).Allergens: contains wheat.Manufactured in a facility that uses milk, soy, tree nuts and wheat on shared equipment.
